Description: Al Andalus Property Co (known as: Alandalus) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 2016. Alandalus operates within the Real Estate sector focusing on Retail REIT's. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia focusing on Real Estate sector. Alandalus Property is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in September 2006.
